summary: Egypt, officially the Arab Republic of Egypt, is a country in Africa and Asia. It's known for its long history, with ancient civilizations along the Nile River. Cairo is the capital and largest city. With over 100 million people, it's one of Africa's most populated countries. Egypt has been influenced by Christianity and Islam. It gained independence from the British in 1922 and became a republic after the 1952 revolution. Recently, Egypt has faced political changes, including the 2011 revolution and elections. It's a regional power with a diverse economy, and it's part of many international organizations.
title: Egypt
